ygData.subject: RE: Ethereal Mist Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the POF armor and Verant already listed it as a bug.  I would not be surprised if this was already fixed with the other database updates they made a
ygData.messageBody:
This is the POF armor and Verant already listed it as a bug. I would not be
surprised if this was already fixed with the other database updates they
made a while back.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro



-----Original Message-----
From: Sirensa Qi'Seraph [mailto:Sirensa@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 10:36 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Ethereal Mist Greaves




Under race for Ethereal Mist Greaves it says HUM ERU HIE HEF DWF - so
dark elf cleric is not able to wear this cleric only item????? Can anyone
confirm this? I am a dark elf cleric and NOT very happy about this if it is
true..

Sirensa
